data.title: Welcome to Dodge County, MN
data.text:
Our Mission

The Mission of Fairview Care Center is to empower individuals to live life to the fullest while guiding them through transitions in their lives with compassion, dignity, and respect.

Fairview Care Center is located on the west edge of Dodge Center on nine acres of land and is surrounded by beautiful trees which are very inviting to birds and other wildlife. We have private rooms with private baths available as well as semi private rooms. Fairview Care Center is certified for Medicare and Medical Assistance.

Our Care Team

Fairview Care Center employs approximately 100 employees. We provide services in nursing, physical/ occupational/speech therapy, dietary, social services, activities, housekeeping, laundry and maintenance.

Medical Services

Medical services are provided through the Kasson Mayo Family Clinic with our Nurse Practitioner on site 3 days a week.

Therapy Services

Fairview Care Center is very proud of the rehabilitative programs that we offer. We provide physical, occupational and speech therapy five days a week. Approximately 40% of the individuals admitted to Fairview Care Center return to their previous living arrangement after a successful rehabilitative stay. We also provide outpatient therapy to individuals living in the community.
